<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->

# Str Node Formatting

Represents a plain non-interpolated string literal (e.g. `"foo"`)

<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

## Formats

Before:

```ruby
"this is a string" \
  " spanning multiple lines"
```

After:

```ruby
"this is a string spanning multiple lines"
```

## Formats methods called on it

Before:

```ruby
"this is a string" .chomp
```

After:

```ruby
"this is a string".chomp
```

## Preserves escaping

Before:

```ruby
"\u{1F64B}"
```

After:

```ruby
"\u{1F64B}"
```
